name: Assault Machinegun, Disposable, Advanced (ADAMg-14)
description: Advanced version of the disposable assault machinegun. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
